titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Ford Foundation records, Publications FA1661

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-10-09 03:04:18 -0400.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Publications, reports, news releases, working files, drafts and photographs.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Records more than 10 years old are open for research, unless otherwise noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at https://rockarch.org/collections/access-and-request-materials/#citations

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in collections primarily by record type and/or accession, and often further arranged by series. Accessions are representative solely of when the materials were processed by RAC, and do not imply an original order of the records. Additional finding aids are created as records are processed and open for research.
